attributes.action: Legislate that companies may only charge the same rate for all their customer contact points
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If companies were only allowed to charge the same rate for their call centres and support lines as they do for their sales lines, (or other contact points), it would reintroduce a much fairer symmetry in the relationship between customers and suppliers. (legislation should  exclude companies from setting up shadow companies or subsidiaries as a loophole method)
